channel.title: 路边的阿不
channel.description: Recent content on 路边的阿不

item.title: 使用IndexNow提升Github Pages网站SEO
item.description: Learn how to optimize SEO for your Github Pages site by using IndexNow. From understanding the purpose of SEO to detailed steps on applying IndexNow, enhance your website visibility efficiently!

item.title: 读后感两篇
item.description: Delve into an enlightening journey reflected upon two game-changing methods of thinking - Lateral Thinking and Six Thinking Hats. Discover new gates towards efficient problem-solving, team collaboration and personal growth!

item.title: 使用「Cloudflare WARP」优化网络体验
item.description: Optimize online connectivity with Cloudflare WARP. Conquer ISP restrictions to enhance your network experience on platforms like ChatGPT, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

item.title: 再平凡的你，也是自己人生的主角
item.description: 深入探索人生价值，倾听一个关于亲身体验的故事，记录和珍惜13年前的博客和故事。赋予生命故事其应有的尊重，发现每个人都是自己生活的主角。

item.title: 将Android通讯录导入已激活IOS设备
item.description: Learn how to import Android contacts into an activated iOS device without 'Move to iOS' app. Overcome the challenges of vCard version constraints with proven solutions.

item.title: 申请到了「JetBrains」开源免费许可证
item.description: Dive into the process of applying for a JetBrains open source license, upgrading your development toolkit, and contributing more effectively to your open source projects.

item.title: 「ps2mc-browser」着色器代码分析
item.description: Uncover the magic behind colorful 3D rendering using OpenGL Shader with the ps2mc-browser. Dive deep into how polygons, vertices, and textures combine to create vibrant tabletop graphics.

item.title: Base64编码在「Apple快捷指令」中的妙用
item.description: Learn how to harness the power of Base64 encoding to insert attachments into Apple Shortcuts actions, boosting the efficiency and functionality of your daily errands beyond the obvious.

item.title: 「Apple快捷指令」 - 数据自动保存至Numbers
item.description: Sharing a commonly used Apple Shortcut, the Fueling Record. Catered for those who crave efficiency, this function simplifies fueling record processes. No need for separate apps or manual tracking. Hope these shortcuts can facilitate your life too.

item.title: 「ps2mc-browser」新功能发布
item.description: Check out the new features and updates in the PS2MC-Browser, a PS2 save file viewer that can now interactively display dynamic 3D Icons, provide enhanced visibility with a skybox layer, and much more.

item.title: 用「VSCode Task」自动化创建博客
item.description: Immerse in innovative ways of improving your writing efficiency using VSCode and ChatGPT. Learn how to swiftly generate blog posts in Hugo, with a mere article title input, and see how translation and automation aid the process.

item.title: 用「Github」和「Cloudflare」自建博客
item.description: Master all the necessary steps to fabricate a stunning blog via Github Pages and Hugo. This comprehensive guide elucidates on how to incorporate personalized elements, capitalize on Cloudflare to accelerate the loading speed, and optimize your blog for superior indexing by search engines.

item.title: PS2纹理图片编码算法「A1B5G5R5」
item.description: Delve into the unique texture mapping coding algorithm, A1B5G5R5, utilized by PS2. Our detailed guide takes you through the principle behind this lossy yet efficient form of image encoding that significantly reduces image size.

item.title: 「RLE」算法在PS2中的应用
item.description: Experience the power of Run Length Encoding (RLE), a fundamental data compression algorithm. Witness its astounding application in PS2 for efficient image compression and unveil the intricacies behind its implementation.

item.title: 使用Python和OpenGL渲染PS2存档3D图标
item.description: Step into the world of 3D icon rendering using tools like Python3, PyGame, Numpy, ModernGL and PyGLM. Discover their unique roles in creating animation effects, light additions, smooth transitions and more within PS2.

item.title: 解析PS2游戏存档3D图标
item.description: Dive deep into the realm of PS2 game development as we demonstrate how to unpack 3D icon data from save files. Our intricate guide covers vertices, model animation, textures, lighting, and backgrounds, all with accurate coding details.

item.title: 从PS2记忆卡中导出存档文件
item.description: Dive into the exciting world of PS2 memory card filesystems and learn how to extract specific game saves using Python. Fully executable code provided. Step into our in-depth analysis!

item.title: 解析PS2记忆卡文件系统
item.description: Immerse yourself in the intricate world of PS2 gaming nostalgia as we delve into the PS2 memory card file system. Uncover how your favorite PS2 games were stored and relive your gaming youth through the eyes of a programming expert.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is a document for testing the support of Markdown syntax.
